sourcesContent: function o(){let a=[],i=[],n={enqueue(e){i.push(e)},addEventListener(e,t,r,s){return e.addEventListener(t,r,s),n.add(()=>e.removeEventListener(t,r,s))},requestAnimationFrame(...e){let t=requestAnimationFrame(...e);return n.add(()=>cancelAnimationFrame(t))},nextFrame(...e){return n.requestAnimationFrame(()=>n.requestAnimationFrame(...e))},setTimeout(...e){let t=setTimeout(...e);return n.add(()=>clearTimeout(t))},add(e){return a.push(e),()=>{let t=a.indexOf(e);if(t>=0){let[r]=a.splice(t,1);r()}}},dispose(){for(let e of a.splice(0))e()},async workQueue(){for(let e of i.splice(0))await e()}};return n}export{o as disposables};
